scripts.start: node -e "const express = require('express'); const app = express(); const PORT = process.env.PORT || 3001; app.use(express.json()); app.get('/health', (req, res) => res.json({success: true, message: 'Server is healthy', timestamp: new Date().toISOString()})); app.get('/', (req, res) => res.json({success: true, message: 'AI Infrastructure Platform API'})); app.listen(PORT, '0.0.0.0', () => console.log('Server running on port', PORT));"
